title: Zhai Shen Yuan Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out, Malaysian
description: Inside the Pavillion Mall at level 1 in the food court you will find this vegetarian food stall serving a large variety of Chinese and Malaysian dishes. You see it when you come down the stairs on the opposite side big red sign reading "vegetarian food". Menu has English with pictures, or choose from the buffet. Mock meat, noodles, rice, soups; partly fresh, partly pre-cooked. Confirmed open, May 2016.
streetAddress: Lot 1.44.00, Level 1, Pavilion mall, 168 Jalan Bukit Bintang
